duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead complex, multi-disciplinary projects from start to finish, plan requirements, identify risks, manage project schedules, and communicate clearly with cross-functional partners.
Provide analytic and operational support to the Technology team within Google Public Sector, engage with stakeholders across GPS and Google Cloud.

Conduct analysis, develop communication materials, and facilitate executive sessions and problem-solving meetings in support of the Technology team’s efforts to develop and accredit technical solutions to customers’ challenges.
Lead special initiatives to improve and transform work, support internal planning and reporting requirements, and help develop technical roadmaps and explore technical dependencies.
Develop, manage, and maintain planning and business reporting materials in support of the GPS business and operational cadence.
Identify and solve strategic/operational problems and manage projects with multiple leaders and cross-functional stakeholders.
Develop, manage, and maintain planning and business reporting materials in support of the GPS business and operational cadence.

Identify gaps and propose changes to existing policy, systems, and process frameworks, develop scalable solutions and manage risks across the organization, and develop best practices that are a benefit across the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a technical field, or equivalent practical experience. MBA or Master's degree preferred.
